'''Underground... Overrated?''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. This achievement is earned during ''[[The Farmer's Treasure]].''

==Trivia==
* The Chinese name is a reference to the game {{lang|''Legend of the Underground Palace''|zh=地宫传奇}}.
